arts.ttl: 100 up for Lewy and perfect Pedri means Barca didn’t miss Yamal
arts.sum: Robert Lewandowski becomes the third player in history to reach 100 Champions League goals #UCL pic.twitter.com/cXenLyGHDN It was a night to celebrate more than just another win in the Champions League, which sets Hansi Flick’s side up nicely in terms of qualification, three more games to negotiate notwithstanding.

arts.ttl: Flick reveals what he told Yamal after Barca’s ‘wonderful’ Brest win
arts.sum: Barcelona boss Hansi Flick was spotted engaged in a lengthy chat with Lamine Yamal after the team’s Champions League win over Brest. The Barca boss has already said he hopes Yamal can return against Las Palmas at the weekend and it seems that will be the case.

arts.ttl: Hansi Flick: 'We have taken an important step'
arts.sum: Before thinking about the game against the Bundesliga club, the coach summed up the performance of his team against Brest. "Our objective is to finish in the top eight," said Flick in his press conference following the win over Éric Roy's team.

arts.ttl: Barcelona 3-0 Brest: Highlights, man of the match, stats as Robert Lewandowski joins Lionel Messi, Cristiano Ronaldo
arts.sum: Sports Mole looks at the highlights, man of the match, and stats from Tuesday's Champions League League clash between Barcelona and Brest.

arts.ttl: Barcelona youngster beats Robert Lewandowski to Man of the Match award vs Brest
arts.sum: Barcelona star Robert Lewandowski was pipped to the Man of the Match award in the club’s latest outing. This comes despite the veteran frontman having found the net twice, to…

arts.ttl: Barcelona star’s well-earned nickname was restored during Brest clash
arts.sum: Viewers of Barcelona’s meeting with Stade Brestois this evening made use of the opportunity to restore an old nickname attached to Blaugrana midfielder Pedri. As much came owing to nothing…

arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS | Barcelona 3-0 Brest: Overpowered Pirates concede first Champions League defeat

arts.ttl: Barcelona 3-0 Brest: Goals and highlights - Champions League 24/25
arts.sum: In fact, Brest are in fourth place of this new-look Champions League, two places above Barcelona, and are undefeated in their opening four matches. Good evening everybody and welcome along to another MARCA in English live blog, this time taking you through the Champions League clash between Barcelona and Brest at Estadi Olimpic Lluis Companys in Montjuic, Barcelona.

arts.ttl: Barcelona star silences widespread critics with performance vs Brest
arts.sum: A member of the defensive ranks at La Liga giants Barcelona this evening conjured up a fine performance when it mattered most. The player in question? Gerard Martín. Left-back Martín…
